text: Musrikon ʙa saxttarin qasamho ʙa Alloh savgand jod kardand, ki agar Muhammad mu'cizae ʙar mo ʙijovarad, ʙa u imon meovarem. Bigu (ej Pajomʙar): «Hamono hamai mu'cizaho nazdi Alloh ast va U qodir ast ʙar ovardani on, har vaqte ki xohad va sumo (ej mu'minon) az kuco medoned, ki agar mu'cizae ham nozil savad, imon nameovarand»
